title: Art of the Movie Title
content:
Typophiles I think will have fun browsing this site on [The Art of the Title.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165904/http:/www.artofthetitle.com/)

author: William Berkson

comments.content: This is a great site. Thanks for sharing.
